speaker: Narrator
text: The anticipation of senior year has set in, and Mary and Sarah are brimming with a mix of excitement and trepidation as they wait to hear back from the colleges they've applied to together.

speaker: Mary
text: I can hardly breathe, Sarah! What if we both get into UCSD? What if we don't?

speaker: Sarah
text: Calm down, wild child! Regardless, it would be nothing short of a dream to journey through college together. I treasure our friendship.

speaker: Narrator
text: They tear open their letters with bated breath. Mary's face illuminates with pure exhilaration.

speaker: Mary
text: Yes, I made it! UCSD here I come!

speaker: Sarah
text: Wow, Mary! You deserve it, truly.

speaker: Mary
text: Sarah, you're quiet. What did your letter say?

speaker: Sarah
text: I...I didn't make it, Mary. UCSD wasn't meant for me.

speaker: Mary
text: Oh, Sarah... I can't... I can't even imagine...

speaker: Sarah
text: Remember, Mary, we knew this was a possibility. Maybe this is life nudging us onto different trails.

speaker: Mary
text: But we had plans, Sarah... conquering the world, remember?

speaker: Sarah
text: Oh, Mary, distance doesn't diminish friendship. And as for life, it has a strange way of leading us to destinations we never dreamt of. We need to trust the journey.

speaker: Narrator
text: Tears betray Sarah's brave front, escaping down her cheeks.

speaker: Sarah
text: And you, Mary, you're a force of nature. UCSD will just be the start for you. Don't let my path divert you from your journey.

speaker: Mary
text: But Sarah... you're my partner in crime, my pillar. I... I don't want to do this without you.

speaker: Sarah
text: This isn't about losing each other, Mary. It's about accepting that growth sometimes means branching out. We'll always have our shared history, but love also means letting go when needed.

speaker: Narrator
text: They cling to each other, their tears staining the other's shoulder, words failing them.

speaker: Mary
text: Sarah, I'll cherish you always. You've made me who I am.

speaker: Sarah
text: Likewise, Mary. Our friendship is etched in my heart forever.

speaker: Narrator
text: In their tearful farewells, they acknowledge the end of an era and the onset of new journeys waiting to be embarked upon.

speaker: Mary and Sarah
text: Farewell, my cherished friend.

speaker: Narrator
text: They part ways with heavy hearts, leaving behind a shared past, but carrying forward an enduring bond of friendship.
